title: How to Center an Image in HTML

steps.title: Don’t use the word “center” in your tag.
steps.content: Don’t use the word “center” in your tag. In HTML coding, you can center text, but you must identify image alignment with the word “middle.” An image is not a line element, so it is identified in relation to other elements.
